Bernardo | footnotes = }} San Bernardo is a city and commune in the Santiago Metropolitan Region, Chile. It is the capital of Maipo Province. According to the 2002 census, 246,762 people lived there. == References == == Other websites == * Municipality of San Bernardo Category:Cities in Chile Category:Santiago Metropolitan Region
